Art Sims (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe osise na onye nduzi nka amụrụ na Detroit, Michigan n'afọ 1954
A maara Sims nke ọma maka ihe ngosi ya maka ihe nkiri ndị Africa America, gụnyere Do the Right Thing (1998) na The Color Purple (1985)
Ọ bụ onye isi na onye guzobere 11:24 Design Advertising na Los Angeles
N'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ, Sims etinyela aka n'ịkwalite na ime ka nka na ọdịbendị ndị Africa America pụta ìhè.
Sims gara ụlọakwụkwọ Cass Technical High School na Detroit wee nata agụmakwụkwọ iji gaa Mahadum Michigan State site na 1971 ruo 1975.
Mgbe ọ ka nọ na kọleji, Sims were ọnọdụ dị ka onye nduzi nka na Columbia Records na Los Angeles, ebe o mepụtara usoro mkpuchi abọm
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Los Angeles dị ka onye nduzi nka na EMI ruo afọ anọ
Sims wee malite ụlọ ọrụ ya 11:24 Design Advertising na 1981.
N'etiti ihe osise mkpuchi abọm ọ mepụtara bụ:
Sims esorowo ndị na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Steven Spielberg, Jon Kilik, George Lucas, John Singleton, na Spike Lee rụọ ọrụ
O mepụtara ihe ngosi maka The Color Purple (1985), Clockers (1995), Do the Right Thing (1989), Dreamgirls (2006), Girl 6 (1996), A Huey P

Newton Story (2001), Jungle Fever (1991), Malcolm X (1992), Summer of Sam (1999), Woman, Thou Art Loosed (2004), Bamboozled (2000), When the Levees Broke: A Requiem in Four Acts (2006), New Jack City (1991), Black Dynamite (2009), Love and Basketball (2000), Mo Better Blues (1990), The Secret Life of Bees (2004), Brooklyn Crookes (2009), The Secret Panthetes (2009), Brooklyn's Finest (2009) na Black Panther (2018)
